resources.string:
"Soften butter Add sugar and cocoa Stir these up. It will be pretty dry, but this will help get the lumps out of the cocoa. Add eggs, one at a time stirring after each. Add vanilla — you might stub your toe a little. Add salt and flour and stir in well.
Pour into greased square pan. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes.
¼ c cocoa (maybe add 2 extra tbsp for a richer chocolaty flavor)
